alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 12:23AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Tyler, northwestern Newton and northern Jasper Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1223 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rosevine to 10 miles north of Rockland to Corrigan. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Woodville, Colmesneil, Chester, Ebenezer, Rockland, Browndell, Harrisburg, Mayflower and Sam Rayburn Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.
